title: Sweet Soy-Garlic Dipping Sauce Recipe
full_text:
Sweet Soy-Garlic Dipping Sauce Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
8 servings
Makes
1 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
soy sauce
1/2
cup
sugar
1/4
cup
rice vinegar
3
medium
cloves garlic
, grated on a microplane grater (about
3
teaspoons
)
1/4
cup
thinly sliced
scallions
1/4
cup
roughly chopped cilantro
2
teaspoons
toasted sesame seed oil
Directions
Whisk all ingredients together in a small bowl until sugar is dissolved. Serve with fried chicken.
